user_description.ru: Она контролирует твоё дыхание — сжимает горло, закрывает рот и нос, садится на лицо.
user_description.en: She controls your breathing — squeezes your throat, covers your mouth and nose, sits on your face.

ai_description.ru: F контролирует дыхание M — рука на горле, закрыть рот/нос, сесть на лицо. Требует опыта и доверия. Edge play.
ai_description.en: F controls M's breathing — hand on throat, cover mouth/nose, sit on face. Requires experience and trust. Edge play.

image_prompt: woman's hand on man's throat controlling his breathing, man lying on bed looking up at her, bedroom setting with soft lighting
